Articles.Content:
I know that there are many mods to extend physics range, but that not what i am not looking for.

I mostly need to lower lag and ram usage when playing on dmp servers
Isn't the range only 2k or 4k max thats not that far.

mostly in DMP servers, reverting does not delete the debris. The runaway get so clutter up that most of the time loading a ship crashes you.

Decreasing the physic range to 100m would save me a gb of RAM

But what about stock players? I would hate it if the render distance was 100 meters in my single player saves.

EDIT: I didn't notice this was the add-ons forum, not the suggestions forum. Sorry, everyone! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T01:13:04Z" title="04/20/2015 01:13  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by Thomas988**
I just want a mod so I can play the game without crashing

Oh crap! I thought this was the suggestion forums, so sorry! ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif) I really ought to pay attention next time. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
